configurations.description: Enables adding baggage entries to the Log4j ThreadContext, prefixed with "baggage.".
configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.log4j-context-data.add-baggage

configurations.description: Specifies the key name used to store the trace ID in the logging context.
configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.common.logging.trace-id

configurations.description: Specifies the key name used to store the span ID in the logging context.
configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.common.logging.span-id

configurations.description: Specifies the key name used to store the trace flags in the logging context.
configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.common.logging.trace-flags

configurations.description: Specifies which resource attributes to add to the logging context as a comma-separated list of attribute keys.
configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.common.mdc.resource-attributes

description: This instrumentation adds trace context (trace ID, span ID, and trace flags) to Log4j's ThreadContext, it does not emit any telemetry on its own.
name: log4j-context-data-2.7
